sourcesContent:
import { Component,HostListener } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-nav', templateUrl: './nav.component.html', styleUrls: ['./nav.component.css'] }) export class NavComponent { public scrolled: boolean = false; @HostListener('window:scroll', []) onWindowScroll() { if (window.pageYOffset > 155) { this.scrolled = true; } else { this.scrolled = false; } } }
